subject: Dear owner
body:
Dear owner
I am Mr.David J. Moyes, Head Officer-in-Charge, Administrative Service Inspection United Nations Inspection Agency in Harts-field-Jackson International Airport Atlanta, Georgia. During our investigation, I discovered an abandoned shipment through a Diplomat from United Kingdom which was transferred from JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta, and when scanned it revealed an undisclosed scam
The consignment was abandoned because the Content was not properly declared by the consignee as money rather it was declared as personal effect/classified document to either avoid diversion by the Shipping Agent or confiscation by the relevant authorities.
The diplomat's inability to pay for Non Inspection fees among other things are the reason why the consignment is delayed and abandoned. By my assessment, each of the boxes contains about $4M or more.They are still left in the airport storage facility till today. The Consignments like I said, are two metal trunk boxes weighing about 65kg each (Internal dimension: W61 x H156 x D73 (cm) effective capacity: 680 L) Approximately. The details of the consignment including your name and email on the official document from the United Nations' office in London where the shipment was tagged as personal effects/classified document is still available with us.
 As it stands now, you have to reconfirm your full name, Phone Number, and full address so I can cross-check and see if it corresponds with the one on the official documents.
 It is now left to you to decide if you still need the consignment or allow us to repatriate it back to the UK (place of origin) as we were instructed.
As I did say again, the shipper abandoned it and ran away most importantly because he gave a false declaration, he could not pay for the yellow tag, he could not secure a valid non inspection document(s), etc. I am ready to assist you in any way I can for you to get back These packages provided you will also give me something out of it (financial gratification). 
You can either come in person, or you engage the services of a secure shipping/delivery Company/agent that will provide the necessary security that is required to deliver the package to your doorstep
 or the destination of your choice. I need all the guarantees that I can get from you before I can get involved in this project.
Reply me through this:Email:(
eze71819@gmail.com
)  for the delivery details
Best Regards,
Mr.David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unite

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Jim Moyes,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite surprising to hear about this abandoned shipment, especially since it seems to be linked with my name and email.

I'm curious, how did the consignee manage to declare the content as personal effect classified document? And why would they abandon such a valuable shipment? 

Also, could you please explain more about the Non Inspection fees and other reasons that led to the delay and abandonment of this shipment?

I appreciate your willingness to assist me in retrieving these packages. However, I'd like to understand more about what you mean by "give me something out of it financial". Could you clarify that part?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Good day to you Barbara

May the Lord who created heaven and the earth guide you and restore all you
have lost and provide all that's required for you to have a good living.
I truly understand each and every point you have mentioned, I assure you
that I myself wouldn't let you down, I want you to have full confidence
over this transaction and put all your best to do the needful.I guarantee
you success once you are able to get the fee settled.

I told you in my previous message that your fund originated from the United
Kingdom and in regards to our investigation over your fund the bank has
tried many times to make a wire transfer to your nominated bank but due to
the laws the bank couldnâ€™t be able to make a successful transfer. In that
case they make a better decision to deliver the fund to you through a
diplomatic agent.

Through our finding, the diplomatic agent diverted the package to the
United States, and he was not able to clear some paperwork in the airport
and he lifted the consignment boxes to our custody. I hope with this you
will understand the position of your fund has stopped here.

Hello, to ensure full access to your delivery of your rightful belonging
and gain full access, you must confirm. Your details or your package will
remain pending until you reconfirm your required information.

Nevertheless, I want you to know that this has nothing to do with scam and
any email you received concerning this transaction from another source is
fake because you would have any access to your box without my approval.

I implore you to do the needful, now that you understand the position of
your consignment with this delivery, you do not need to be skeptical or
hardheaded about this, I have offered my professional advice on this matter
and it will be in your best interest to adhere with the laid down
procedures of receiving your package.

Complete your information today and get started!

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit.
Tel:  (470) 819 3193

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation about the situation of my fund. It's quite a complex process, isn't it? 

You mentioned that the diplomatic agent diverted the package to the United States and it's currently in your custody. Could you please elaborate more on why he did so? And what kind of paperwork was he unable to clear at the airport?

Also, you mentioned a fee that needs to be settled for me to gain full access to my delivery. Could you provide more details about this fee? What is it for exactly and how much is it?

I'm eager to understand all these aspects better before proceeding further.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Attn: Barbara

I write to acknowledge your swift response, I appreciate your time and
cooperation.
Thank you for your comprehensive update and explanation regarding your
process also requested to understand the simple procedures to enable you
claim your funds. I must say, that your consignment are intact. Yes, the
delivery agent deverted the consignment for his selfish interest also the
certificate that he couldn't be able to to provide are Anti money
laundering and Terrorism certificate.

Lastly, concerning the fee I want you to know that what you are required to
pay is storage keepings worth $720 due to the delay the consignment box has
been under the security guards.

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit.
Tel:  (470) 819 3193

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

Thank you for your swift response and the detailed explanation about the process. I must say, it's quite intriguing! 

I'm curious to know more about this delivery agent who diverted the funds for his selfish interest. That sounds like quite a story! Could you tell me more about what happened there?

Also, could you please explain a bit more about these Anti money laundering and Terrorism procedures? I'm not very familiar with them but they sound important.

Regarding the storage keepings fee, could you provide some more details? How much is it exactly and why has there been a delay?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

Thank you for your swift response and the detailed explanation about the process. I appreciate your time and effort in this matter.

I'm a bit confused about the delivery agent's actions, could you please elaborate more on that? Also, could you explain what Anti money laundering and Terrorism are?

Regarding the storage keeping fee, how much is it exactly? And why has there been a delay in the box being under security guards?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Attn: Barbara

Ok, your email is well received,
After careful inspection of the amount, I want to let you know that the fee
is what exact what you have to pay. The fact is that your consignment box
has been under the security protections and that's the reason you are
paying for the security storage keepings. In regards on the certificate, as
soon as your payment for the strogae keepings has been received the Anti
money laundering and Terrorism that has been stated would be obtain and
send to you before the delivery comments. That shouldm't be your borthing.

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit.
Tel:  (470) 819 3193

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in keeping my box secure.

I'm a bit confused about the fee, though. Could you please clarify what exactly this fee is for? Is it a one-time payment or will there be additional charges in the future?

Also, could you explain more about the Anti-money laundering and Terrorism statement? I'm not quite sure I understand what that means.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Attn: Barbara

Please, you don't have to as much question about the Anti money laundering
and Terrorism because is not in your field but all you have to do to get
the required fee $720 paid also no order fee involve on this delivery and
the fee is for security storage keepings.

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit.
Tel:  (470) 819 3193

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. I appreciate your guidance on this matter. 

I'm curious, could you please explain a bit more about what the security storage keeping fee covers? And how is it usually handled in situations like this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Attn: Barbara

Good question, but the answer would be giving to you after your payment has
been confirmed.

Thank you.

Mr. David Jim Moyes

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Hello Mr. David Jim Moyes,

Thank you for your quick response! I'm really excited to learn more about this. Could you please explain a bit more about the payment process? How does it work exactly? And what will I receive after my payment has been confirmed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:
Attn: Barbara
I need your full name and address, and your telephone number. In respect to
the payment you have to know that the fee has to be paid through bank to
bank.

Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Jim Moyes
Head Officer-in-Charge
Administrative Service Inspection Unit.
Tel:  (470) 819 3193

subject: Re: Dear owner
body:

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in learning more about this process. Could you please explain to me how the bank-to-bank payment works? 

Also, I'd like to know more about the Service Inspection Unit that you're heading. What exactly does it do?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara
